com.device.kerberos.rest.client

Interface IKerberosAuthenticationClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KerberosAuthenticationClientImpl

    public interface IKerberosAuthenticationClient
    This interface provides the functionality of Kerberos Authentication for the Application. Uses the ApplicationDetailService class to fetch the Application registration information i.e. the Login name and Password
    Author:
    raunak

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean kerberosAuthentication()
      This method checks for Application Authentication using the Kerberos Protocol.

    • Method Detail

      • kerberosAuthentication

        boolean kerberosAuthentication()
                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                      RestClientException,
                                      ResponseDecryptionException,
                                      ApplicationDetailServiceUninitializedException
        This method checks for Application Authentication using the Kerberos Protocol. Uses the ApplicationDetailService class to fetch the Application registration information i.e. the Login name and Password. These information are used to get a TGT. This retrieve TGT is stored in the model TGT. If the authentication is successful creates a KerberosAppSession which could be retrived from KerberosSessionManager getKerberosAppSession() method
        Returns:
        boolean true if the Authentication is successful otherwise, false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case there are some errors encountered while retrieving information
        RestClientException - If the status of the response is not 200. The server side error message and error response code can be accessed using getMessage and getErrorCode methods respectively
        ResponseDecryptionException - If the Application was unable to decrypt the Response sent by the server
        ApplicationDetailServiceUninitializedException - In case if the ApplicationDetailService has not been configured properly
